casebody.data:
Haegmeyer, Respondent, v. Manhattan Ry. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. March 3, 1891.) Appeal from equity term. Action by Mina Christiana Haegmeyer against the Manhattan Railway Company and another. From a judgment in plaintiff’s favor, defendants appeal.

*957Argued, before Sedgwick, C. J., and Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Davies <£- Sapallo, for appellants. James B. Ludlow, for respondent. Per Curiam.

The judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
